info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 4:25AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Lewis and Clark and southwestern Teton Counties through 500 AM MDT... At 423 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles northwest of Lincoln, or 29 miles northeast of Drummond, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, pea size hail and heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Nilan Reservoir and Bean Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
